transcripts.transcript_text:
Speaker A: Hello? Hello. Yeah. Hello. Am I speaking to Rishabh? Yes, you are speaking to Rishabh. Please tell me. Sir. Bhaganahan.
Speaker B: I. I received.
Speaker A: A call from you this morning. Yes. Sir, I have this follow up regarding a student accommodation for University College London. Yes, I can see that you have filled the booking form for one of the properties. Surrey Queen Lylden House, London. Correct. Exactly. But the room type which you have filled the booking form, it's sold out. The room type was silver, non ensuite plus room. Correct. 255.
Speaker B: Sterling a week.
Speaker A: Right? Yes, but that is so allowed to some other options. Yeah, that is sold out. Only one room type is available in that property. That is a premium one suite. How much does that cost? How much is. How much does it cost? It's £365 per week. Okay. Hello, Sir.
Speaker B: I won't be. I won't be moving forward with my. With my application. Like without specific. Without specific house.
Speaker A: Which accommodation that you want? Like what's the budget that you're on so that I can suggest you someone.
